org.daisy.dotify.api.translator

Interface MarkerProcessor


  • public interface MarkerProcessor
    Provides an interface to a marker processor. A marker processor is responsible for converting and inserting the supplied text attributes as text markers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String processAttributes(TextAttribute atts, java.lang.String... text)
      Processes the input text and attributes into a text containing markers at the appropriate positions.
      java.lang.String[] processAttributesRetain(TextAttribute atts, java.lang.String[] text)
      Processes the input text chunks and attributes into a text containing markers at the appropriate positions while retaining the text partition as specified by the input array.

    • Method Detail

      • processAttributes

        java.lang.String processAttributes(TextAttribute atts,
                                   java.lang.String... text)
        Processes the input text and attributes into a text containing markers at the appropriate positions. The length of the text(s) must match the text attributes specified width.
        Parameters:
        atts - the text attributes that apply to the text.
        text - the text(s) to process
        Returns:
        returns a string with markers
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified attributes does not match the text.

      • processAttributesRetain

        java.lang.String[] processAttributesRetain(TextAttribute atts,
                                           java.lang.String[] text)
        Processes the input text chunks and attributes into a text containing markers at the appropriate positions while retaining the text partition as specified by the input array. The length of the texts must match the text attributes specified width.
        Parameters:
        text - the texts to process
        atts - the text attributes that apply to the text.
        Returns:
        returns an array of strings with markers
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified attributes does not match the text.
